sourcesContent:
import React, { Component, handleSubmit } from 'react';
import { Form, FormField, Button, TextInput, Box } from 'grommet';

export default class InputForm5 extends Component {
    documentData;
    constructor(props) {
        super(props);
        this.handleChange = this.handleChange.bind(this);
        this.handleFormSubmit = this.handleFormSubmit.bind(this);
        this.state = {
            Device1: '',
            Device2: '',
            Device3: ''
        }
    }
 
handleChange= (e)=> {
    this.setState({[e.target.name]:e.target.value});
}

handleFormSubmit(e) {
    e.preventDefault()
   localStorage.setItem('document',JSON.stringify(this.state));
}
 
componentDidMount() {
    this.documentData = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('document'));
}

handleSubmit=() => {
    alert("Resert clicked")
}


render() {
    return (
        <>
        <Box justify="center">
        <Box direction="column" alignSelf="center"  border={{ color: 'brand', size: 'small' }} pad="medium"> 
        <Form key={5}>
        <FormField label="Import Approval No. (EOU/STPI)" width="large">
          <TextInput placeholder="Enter Import Approval No. (EOU/STPI)" />
        </FormField>
        <FormField label="Approval Date">
          <TextInput placeholder="Enter Approval Date" />
        </FormField>
        <FormField label="BOE No.">
          <TextInput placeholder="Enter BOE No." />
        </FormField>
        <FormField label="BOE Date">
          <TextInput placeholder="Enter BOE Date" />
        </FormField>
        <FormField label="Bond Number">
          <TextInput placeholder="Enter Bond Number" />
        </FormField>
        <FormField label="Bond Date">
          <TextInput placeholder="Enter Bond Date" />
        </FormField>
        <FormField label="CIF Value">
          <TextInput placeholder="Enter CIF Value" />
        </FormField>
        <FormField label="Assessable Value">
          <TextInput placeholder="Enter Assessable Value" />
        </FormField>
        <FormField label="Duty Forgone">
          <TextInput placeholder="Enter Duty Forgone" />
        </FormField>
        <FormField label="IGST Assv Value">
          <TextInput placeholder="Enter IGST Assv Value" />
        </FormField>
        <FormField label="IGST Duty Exempt">
          <TextInput placeholder="Enter IGST Duty Exempt" />
        </FormField>
        <FormField label="EOU/STPI Location">
          <TextInput placeholder="Enter EOU/STPI Location" />
        </FormField>
        <FormField label="Cleared Date">
          <TextInput placeholder="Enter Cleared Date" />
        </FormField>
        <FormField label="E-way Bill">
          <TextInput placeholder="Enter E-way Bill" />
        </FormField>
        <FormField label="E-way Bill Date">
          <TextInput placeholder="Enter E-way Bill Date" />
        </FormField>
        <FormField label="DC No.">
          <TextInput placeholder="Enter DC No." />
        </FormField>
        <FormField label="DC Date">
          <TextInput placeholder="Enter DC Date" />
        </FormField>
        <FormField label="Import Month">
          <TextInput placeholder="Enter Import Month" />
        </FormField>
        <FormField label="Import Year">
          <TextInput placeholder="Enter Import Year" />
        </FormField>
        <FormField label="Original Shipping Docs-Received or Not">
          <TextInput placeholder="Enter Original Shipping Docs-Received or Not" />
        </FormField>
        <FormField label="Asset Age">
          <TextInput placeholder="Enter Asset Age" />
        </FormField>
        <FormField label="Bond Status">
          <TextInput placeholder="Enter Bond Status" />
        </FormField>
        <Button key={5} type="submit" alignSelf="center" primary label="Submit"  />
      </Form>

          </Box> 
          </Box> 
       </> 
    )
}
}
